description: This CSS file contains styles and CSS variables for managing themes in a React application, with specific light and dark theme customizations.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container with style settings that adjusts to the current theme.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the application styled according to the theme variables.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links within the app to conform to the selected theme.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling between light and dark themes, with hover effects.
